metadata.title: CVE-2024-21733 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information vulnerabilityin Apache Tomcat.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: from 8.5.7 through8.5.63, from 9.0.0-M11 through 9.0.43. Users are recommended to upgrade toversion 8.5.64 onwards or 9.0.44 onwards, which contain a fix for theissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-21733` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtomcat9-java - 9.0.70-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.70-2').
tomcat10 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
